name: great harvest pumpkin coasters
notes:
brighten up your fall decor with these fast and fun crochet pumpkin coasters!  you will enjoy making these fun coasters for yourself or to give away!

easy to follow pattern with detailed instructions.

skill level: advanced beginner

> please note that this pattern is
> available for free on my blog
> [here][1]. the benefit of purchasing
> this pdf is an easy to read,
> printable, and ad-free version of the
> pattern.

materials needed:

* worsted weight yarn
* crochet hook size g (4.00 mm)
* tapestry needle for weaving in ends & assembly

finished coaster is 4.5" across.

pattern will be available for instant download upon payment.

the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of crochet 365 knit too. this pattern and design are subject to copyright and are for personal, non-commercial use only. you may not distribute or sell this pattern under any circumstances. 
due to the nature of the product there will be no refunds after purchase.
